verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of Asaph. <S%H623><s%> God <S%H430><s%> standeth <S%H5324><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the mighty; <S%H410><s%> he judgeth <S%H8199><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the gods. <S%H430><s%>
How long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> will ye judge <S%H8199><s%> unjustly, <S%H5766><s%> and accept <S%H5375><s%> the persons <S%H6440><s%> of the wicked? <S%H7563><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Defend <S%H8199><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> and fatherless: <S%H3490><s%> do justice <S%H6663><s%> to the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H7326><s%>
Deliver <S%H6403><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> and needy: <S%H34><s%> rid <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

They know <S%H3045><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will they understand; <S%H995><s%> they walk on <S%H1980><s%> in darkness: <S%H2825><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the foundations <S%H4146><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> are out of course. <S%H4131><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> have said, <S%H559><s%> Ye are gods; <S%H430><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> of you <S%H859><s%> are children <S%H1121><s%> of the most High. <S%H5945><s%>
But <S%H403><s%> ye shall die <S%H4191><s%> like men, <S%H120><s%> and fall <S%H5307><s%> like one <S%H259><s%> of the princes. <S%H8269><s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> shalt inherit <S%H5157><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>
